free: #c 我把爸爸的酒放在飯桌上(爸爸要喝)
#e I put Father's wine on the table (for Father to drink).

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu

free: #c 現在梅子已經賣掉了。
#e Now the plums have already been sold out.

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu

free: #c (我)背著小孩插秧。
#e (I) transplanted seedlings,child being carried on the back.’

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu

free: #c 我要整理麻竹了。
#e I’m going to clean the Ma Bamboo.

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu

free: #c 如果看到山豬的足跡，就做山豬的陷阱。
#e If the boar’s trace is seen, he will make the trap for boars.

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu

gloss: 過去-主焦-陷阱=狀態改變
free: #c 如果他們已經設好陷阱了，他們就會走到他們的獵寮。
#e If (they) have already set up the trap, they would rush to their hunting shed.

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu

free: #c 小孩會掉下來，因為是揹在背上。
#e The child would fall down because it’s carried on the back.

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu

free: #c 明天(獵人們)會去設陷阱。
#e Tomorrow, (the hunters) will go and set up traps.

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu

free: #c 我是Mu'u叔叔。
#e I am Uncle Mu’u.

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu

free: #c 我要說打獵的事。
#e I am going to talk about hunting.

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu

free: #c 因為我所有的小孩都被娶走了。
#e Because all my children were married.

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu

free: #c 所以(她)叫我再說一遍小米的事。
#e So (she) told me to talk about the millet again.

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu

free: #c (我們的)長輩們以前種芋頭和地瓜。
#e (Our) parents used to grow taro and sweet potatoes.

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu

free: #c 我逝世的母親年紀很大。
#e My late mother was old.

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu

free: #c 我耕作(在)小田地。
#e I did (it) on a small field.

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu

free: #c Pani幫媽媽拿衣服。
#e Pani helps mother take clothes.

meta.language: 卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
卡那卡那富語, Kanakanavu, Kanakanavu
